entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 9.
